'''Crimson Obsidian Ring''' is an [[Adventure Item]], crafted with {{Item|Crimson Obsidian Fragment|x=3}}. Once obtained, it allows the player to access the [[Tribal Secret Space]] of the [["Flower-Feather Clan"]].
